If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.
{h}

Name: Collapsing Bridge
Special: {s} Boost: Place 1 infamy counter on Criminal Enterprise. If you cannot, remove 1 madness counter from State of Madness.

Name: Oscorp Manufacturing

Printings.Flavor: Despite objections from shareholders, Oscorp now exclusively produces military-grade weaponry.

Rules:
When Revealed (Norman Osborn): Place an additional 1{i} threat here.
{a}

Name: Green Goblin
Rules:
When Revealed: Deal 3 encounter cards to each player.
{s} Forced Response: After Green Goblin attacks and damages you, place 2 threat on the main scheme.

Name: Mutagen Cloud

Printings.Flavor: As the cloud engulfs the city, those unfortunate enough to be caught in the vapors begin to shiver and shift, mutating into hideous goblin creatures.

Rules: When Revealed: Advance to stage 2B.

Name: Mutagen Cloud

Printings.Flavor: The goblin creatures serve Green Goblin's every command. Stop Green Goblin before his monstrous militia overruns the city!

Rules:
X is equal to the number of Goblin enemies (including Green Goblin) in play.
If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

Name: Power Drain
Rules:
When Defeated: Discard 2 cards from the encounter deck. Each player must choose and discard 1 resource of any type from their hand for each boost icon discarded this way.
{a}

Name: Reactor Meltdown

Printings.Flavor: Radioactive Man is using his power to overload a nuclear reactor!

Rules:
When Defeated: Deal 1 damage to each friendly character in play.
{c}

Name: Zealot of Truth
Rules: Threat cannot be removed from the Universal Church of Truth side scheme.
Special: {s} Boost: Put Zealot of Truth into play engaged with you.

Name: Cosmic Inquisition
Rules:
Incite 2.
When Revealed: If the Universal Church of Truth side scheme is in play, discard the top 10 cards of your deck. Otherwise, search the encounter deck, discard pile, and set-aside area for Universal Church of Truth and reveal it. Shuffle the encounter deck.

Name: Ebony Maw
Rules:
{s} Forced Interrupt: When Ebony Maw activates against you, remove an invocation counter from each Spell card in your play area.
When Revealed: Each player discards cards from the top of the encounter deck until they discard a Spell card and puts that card into play in their play area.

Name: Ebony Maw
Rules:
{s} Forced Interrupt: When Ebony Maw activates against you, remove an invocation counter from each Spell card in your play area.
When Revealed: Each player discards cards from the top of the encounter deck until they discard a Spell card and puts that card into play in their play area.

Name: Attack on Knowhere

Printings.Flavor: Ebony Maw leads an assault on Knowhere in order to capture the Power Stone stored within.

Rules: Contents: Ebony Maw (I) and Ebony Maw (II). (Ebony Maw (II) and Ebony Maw (III) for expert mode.) Ebony Maw and Standard encounter sets. Two modular encounter sets (Armies of Titan and Black Order).

Name: Attack on Knowhere
Rules: When Revealed: Each player discards cards from the top of the encounter deck until a Spell environment is discarded and puts it into play in their play area. Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck.

Name: The Power Stone
Rules: When Revealed: Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck. Each player discards cards from the top of the encounter deck until a Spell environment is discarded and puts it into play in their play area.

Name: The Power Stone

Printings.Flavor: Ebony Maw uses his powerful magic to occupy you while his agents search for the Power Stone.

Rules: If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

Name: Reactor Overload

Printings.Flavor: The Maw's troops have stormed Knowhere's engine room and set the station to overload.

Rules:
When Revealed: Each player must choose to either take 2 damage or place 2 threat here.
{c}

Name: The Black Order

Printings.Flavor: Thanos recruited the most dangerous mercenaries in the galaxy to form the Black Order.

Rules:
While a Black Order minion is in play, threat cannot be removed from this side scheme.
{h}

Name: Blood to Spare
Rules: When Revealed: Each minion engaged with a player activates against that player. Each player who is not engaged with a minion searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a Black Order minion and puts it into play engaged with them. Shuffle the encounter deck.

Name: Proxima Midnight
Rules:
{s} Forced Interrupt: When Proxima Midnight attacks you, choose to either deal 1 damage to Avengers Tower, or Proxima Midnight gets +2 ATK for this attack.
Proxima Midnight cannot be defeated while Corvus Glaive has any hit points remaining.

Name: Corvus Glaive
Rules:
{s} Forced Response: After Corvus Glaive makes an undefended attack, discard the top card of the encounter deck → deal 1 damage to Avengers Tower for each boost icon ({b}) on that card.
Corvus Glaive cannot be defeated while Proxima Midnight has any hit points remaining.

Name: The Armies of Thanos

Printings.Flavor: Corvus Glaive directs his forces from the front, using his tactical genius to counter the Avengers' defense.

Rules:
Corvus Glaive's Scheme.
Forced Interrupt: When this stage would be completed, remove all the threat from this stage instead. Then, deal each player 1 facedown encounter card.

Name: Avengers Tower
Rules:
When Revealed: Discard each other Avengers Tower from play.
Forced Response: After damage is placed here, if there is at least 9{i} damage here, the players lose the game.

Name: Proxima's Spear
Rules:
Attach to Proxima Midnight.
{s} Proxima Midnight's attacks gain overkill and piercing.
Hero Action: Take 1 damage and spend {e}{m} resources → discard this card.

Name: Corvus's Glaive
Rules:
Attach to Corvus Glaive.
Corvus Glaive gains retaliate 1.
Hero Action: Take 1 damage and spend {e}{p} resources → discard this card.

Name: Rain Fire
Rules: When Revealed: Deal 3 damage to Avengers Tower.
Special: {s} Boost: If damage from this attack defeats an ally, deal 3 damage to Avengers Tower.

Name: City Under Attack

Printings.Flavor: Corvus orders a regiment of his troops to assault New York City in order to draw out the Avengers.

Name: Thanos
Rules:
Stalwart. Toughness.
When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for Thanos's Helmet and reveal it. (Shuffle.)
Forced Response: After the Infinity Stone deck runs out, give Thanos 1 facedown boost card.

Name: The Infinity Stones
Rules: Contents: Thanos I and Thanos II (Thanos II and Thanos III for expert mode). Thanos, Infinity Gauntlet, and Standard sets. Two modular sets (Black Order and Children of Thanos). See rules insert for The Infinity Gauntlet rules.

Name: Balance the Scales
Rules: When Revealed: Each player shuffles their discard pile into their deck. Each player removes the top half of their deck (rounded down) from the game.

Name: The Titan's Throne

Printings.Flavor: From his throne room deep inside Sanctuary, Thanos plots the destruction of everything.

Rules:
When Defeated: Choose and discard an Infinity Stone from play.
{y}

Name: Tribute

Printings.Flavor: The Black Order worship death and demand tribute from those they conquer.

Rules:
When Defeated: Deal the player who defeated this scheme a facedown encounter card.
{c}

Name: Power Stone

Printings.Flavor: The Power Stone increases the strength and durability of its owner and enhances any superhuman abilities they possess.

Rules: Special: You are stunned. If you were already stunned, take 3 damage. Place this card in the Infinity Stone deck discard pile.

Name: Soul Stone

Printings.Flavor: The Soul Stone imbues its owner with immeasurable strength of spirit and the ability to enhance their natural state.

Rules: Special: Heal 3 damage from the villain and give it a facedown boost card. Place this card in the Infinity Stone deck discard pile.

Name: Time Stone

Printings.Flavor: With the Time Stone, its owner can bend time to their will: speeding it up, slowing it down, or even reversing its course.

Rules: Special: Discard the top 4 cards of your deck and place 1 threat on the main scheme for each different card type discarded this way. Place this card in the Infinity Stone deck discard pile.

Name: Hall of Nastrond
Hela's Crown
Rules:
Attach to Hela.
{s} Forced Response: After Hela schemes, give her a facedown boost card.
Special: {s} Boost: Attach Hela's Crown to Hela.

Name: Fallen Warrior
Rules:
Treat attached ally as an Undead minion with a blank text box. Attached minion's SCH is equal to its printed THW and it does not take consequential damage.
When Revealed: Discard cards from the top of your deck until you discard an ally. Put that ally into play engaged with you with Fallen Warrior attached to it.

Name: Legions of Hel
Rules:
When Revealed: Place 2 additional threat here for each Undead minion in play. If there are no Undead minions in play, this card gains surge.
{c}

Name: Unnatural Storm

Printings.Flavor: The deadly cold of Jotunheim immobilizes even the hardiest of heroes.

Rules:
Heroes and allies cannot be readied by player card effects.
When Revealed: Exhaust each ally in play.

Name: Loki
Rules:
Victory 1.
{s} Loki's attacks gain piercing.
When Defeated: Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a side scheme is discarded. Reveal that side scheme.

Name: All Hail King Loki
Rules:
Contents: Loki, Infinity Gauntlet, and Standard encounter sets. Two modular encounter sets (Enchantress and Frost Giants).
Setup: Set each copy of the Loki villain aside, out of play. Put the War in Asgard side scheme into play. Shuffle the encounter deck Reveal 1 set-aside Loki villain at random. Reveal the top card of the Infinity Stone deck.

Name: Casket of Ancient Winters

Printings.Flavor: Loki raided Odin's armory and discovered the Frost Giants' ancient weapon.

Name: War in Asgard

Printings.Flavor: Loki's followers do battle with those still loyal to Odin.

Name: Madness on Midgard

Printings.Flavor: The God of Mischief sows chaos on Earth for his own amusement.

Name: Security Breach
Rules:
Hinder 2{i}. Victory 2.
When Revealed: Each player places a random card from their hand facedown here.
When Defeated: Return each facedown card here to its owner's hand.
{y}

Name: Save the Shawarma Place

Printings.Flavor: Black Order soldiers run rampant through the city around Avengers Tower, threatening the heroes' favorite restaurant.

Rules:
Hinder 1{i}.
When Defeated: Each player shuffles 1 copy of Shawarma into their deck. Flip this card over.

Name: Hack Sanctuary's Computer

Printings.Flavor: In order to defeat Thanos, you must deactivate his ship's many defenses.

Name: Open the Dungeons

Printings.Flavor: Sif and the Warriors Three have been imprisoned by the usurper, Loki. They would be valuable allies if rescued!

Rules:
When Defeated: Each player chooses 1 Captive ally from the campaign set and puts it into play under their control. Flip this card over.
{y}

Name: Jormungand
Rules:
Attach to Loki.
Loki gets +4{i} hit points.
Forced Interrupt: When Loki is defeated, remove this card from the game.
{a}

Name: Kang (Iron Lad)
Rules:
Retaliate 1. Toughness.
When Defeated: Remove Inexorable Fate from the game. At the end of the phase, join another game area.

Name: Kang (Rama-Tut)
Rules:
Toughness.
{s} This villain gets +1 ATK for each obligation in play.
When Defeated: Remove The Realm of Rama-Tut from the game. At the end of the phase, join another game area.

Name: Kang (The Conqueror)
Rules:
Toughness.
{s} Forced Interrupt: When Kang attacks you, either place 1 threat on the main scheme, or he gets +2 ATK for this attack.
When Defeated: The players win the game.

Name: Inexorable Fate
Rules: When Revealed: Create your own game area and place this scheme in it. Add Kang (Iron Lad) to the game area and deal yourself an encounter card.

Name: Inexorable Fate
Rules:
Forced Response: After this stage is completed, place 1 set-aside Kang's Dominion facedown under stage 4A. At the end of the phase, remove Kang (Iron Lad) and this stage from the game and combine your game area with another game area.
If all the players at this stage are defeated, this stage is completed.

Name: The Realm of Rama-Tut
Rules: When Revealed: Create your own game area and place this scheme in it. Add Kang (Rama-Tut) to the game area and deal yourself an encounter card.

Name: The Present Future War
Rules: When Revealed: Create your own game area and place this scheme in it. Add Kang (Scarlet Centurion) to the game area and deal yourself an encounter card.

Name: The Present Future War
Rules:
Forced Response: After this stage is completed, place 1 set-aside Kang's Dominion facedown under stage 4A. At the end of the phase, remove Kang (Scarlet Centurion) and this stage from the game and combine your game area with another game area.
If all the players at this stage are defeated, this stage is completed.

Name: Kang's Wrath

Printings.Flavor: You used your enemy's technology to reunite in the present day, just in time to counter Kang's assault on Earth.

Rules: When Revealed: Reveal Kang (III) and add him to the game area. Reveal each facedown Kang's Dominion under this stage.

Name: Marked for Death
Rules:
When Revealed: The Clint Barton player searches their hand, deck, discard pile, and play area for Mockingbird and places her faceup beneath this card. When this scheme is defeated, return Mockingbird to her owner's hand.
{a}

Name: Crossfire's Rifle
Rules:
Attach to Crossfire. Otherwise, attach to the villain.
{s} When attached enemy attacks, the attack gains ranged.
Hero Action: Exhaust your hero and spend a {w} resource → discard Crossfire's Rifle.

Name: Crossbones
Rules:
{s} While Crossbones has a Weapon attachment, his attacks gain piercing.
When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for Crossbones's Machine Gun and attach it to Crossbones. Shuffle the encounter deck.

Printings.Flavor: Inside the Project P.E.G.A.S.U.S. facility, S.H.I.E.L.D. agents fight desperately to prevent Hydra from obtaining the Reality Stone stored within.

Name: The Infinity Stone
Rules: When Revealed: Reveal the top card of the Experimental Weapons deck.

Printings.Flavor: Hydra has seized the Infinity Stone, and Crossbones orders their withdrawal. You must stop them before they escape!

Name: The Getaway
Rules:
When Revealed: Reveal the top card of the Experimental Weapons deck.
If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

Name: Hard as Nails
Rules: When Revealed: Give the villain a tough status card. If you cannot, heal 3 damage from it instead.
Special: {s} Boost: Give the villain a tough status card. If you cannot, heal 3 damage from it instead.

Name: Crossbones' Assault

Printings.Flavor: Crossbones is a heartless killer, but he's not a psychopath. His assault on P.E.G.A.S.U.S. is ruthless and efficient.

Rules:
When Defeated: Crossbones activates against the player who defeated this scheme.
{a}

Name: Cornered Staff

Printings.Flavor: Hydra is rounding up P.E.G.A.S.U.S. staff to hold as hostages.

Rules:
When Revealed: Discard 1{i} cards from the top of the encounter deck. Place 1 additional threat here for each boost icon on cards discarded this way.
{c}

Name: Absorbing Man
Rules:
Absorbing Man gains the trait of each environment in play.
When Revealed: If Super Absorbing Power is in play, deal 1 encounter card to each player. Otherwise, search the encounter deck and discard pile for Super Absorbing Power and reveal it. Shuffle the encounter deck if it was searched this way.

Name: Absorbing Man
Rules:
Absorbing Man gains the trait of each environment in play.
{s} Forced Response: After Absorbing Man activates against you, if he has the:
• Ice or Stone trait, place 1 threat on the main scheme.
• Metal or Wood trait, take 1 indirect damage.

Name: None Shall Pass
Rules:
Contents: Absorbing Man (I) and Absorbing Man (II). Absorbing Man and Standard encounter sets. One modular encounter set (Hydra Patrol).
Setup: Discard cards from the encounter deck until an environment is discarded. Put that card into play and shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck.

Name: None Shall Pass
Rules:
{s} Forced Response: After resolving step one of the villain phase, place 1 delay counter here.
Forced Interrupt: When an environment enters play, discard each other environment card in play.
If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

Name: Snowy Hillside
Rules:
Surge.
Forced Response: After Absorbing Man makes an undefended attack against you, place 1 threat on the main scheme (2 threat instead if there are 5 or more delay counters on the main scheme).
Special: {s} Boost: Put this card into play.

Name: Rocky Outcrop
Rules:
Surge.
Forced Response: After Absorbing Man makes an undefended attack against you, heal 1 damage from him (2 damage instead if there are 5 or more delay counters on the main scheme).
Special: {s} Boost: Put this card into play.

Name: Abandoned Facility
Rules:
Surge.
Forced Response: After Absorbing Man makes an undefended attack against you, discard 1 resource icon from your hand (2 resource icons instead if there are 5 or more delay counters on the main scheme).
Special: {s} Boost: Put this card into play.

Name: Ball and Chain
Rules:
Attach to Absorbing Man.
Hero Action: Spend a {p} resource → shuffle this card into the encounter deck.
Special: {s} Boost: Reveal this card.

Name: Swinging Stone
Rules:
When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Absorbing Man schemes. If Absorbing Man has the Stone trait, he gets +1 SCH for this activation.
When Revealed (Hero): Absorbing Man attacks you. If Absorbing Man has the Stone trait, he gets +1 ATK for this activation.

Name: Steel Kick
Rules:
When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Place 2 threat on the main scheme (3 threat instead if Absorbing Man has the Metal trait).
When Revealed (Hero): Take 3 indirect damage (4 indirect damage instead if Absorbing Man has the Metal trait).

Name: Piercing Thorns
Rules: When Revealed: Discard 1 card at random from your hand. If Absorbing Man has the Wood trait, discard 1 card you control.
Special: {s} Boost: If Absorbing Man has the Stone or Wood trait, you are stunned.

Name: Avalanche!
Rules:
When Revealed: Each player must choose to either spend a {e} resource or take 2 indirect damage (3 indirect damage instead if there are 5 or more delay counters on the main scheme).
{a}

Name: Super Absorbing Power

Printings.Flavor: Creel has the ability to absorb the properties of multiple elements at once, but it requires intense concentration.

Rules: Absorbing Man gains the Ice, Metal, Stone, and Wood traits.
Special: {s} Boost: Reveal this card.

Name: Hunting Down Heroes

Printings.Flavor: The notorious Taskmaster has been appointed Hydra's chief of police. His top priority is hunting down the outlaw heroes.

Rules:
{s} Forced Response: After resolving step one of the villain phase, each player in hero form must choose to either place 1 threat here or take 1 damage.
If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

Name: Hydra Hunter
Rules: {s} Hydra Hunter's attacks gain piercing and ranged.
Special: {s} Boost: If you are in hero form, take 1 damage. Otherwise, place 1 threat on the main scheme.

Name: Taskmaster's Sword
Rules:
Attach to Taskmaster.
{s} Taskmaster's attacks gain piercing.
Hero Action: Exhaust your hero and spend {m}{p} resources → discard this card.

Name: Mimicry
Rules:
When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Discard the top 5 cards of your deck. If a Thwart card was discarded this way, Taskmaster schemes.
When Revealed (Hero): Discard the top 5 cards of your deck. If an Attack card was discarded this way, Taskmaster attacks you.

Name: Taskmaster's Training Camp

Printings.Flavor: Taskmaster only accepts the best troops into his police force. Before a Hydra soldier can enlist, they must survive his training camp.

Rules:
Forced Response: After a minion enters play, give it a tough status card.
{h}

Name: Zola
Rules:
Retaliate 1.
When Revealed: Each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a minion and reveals it. (Shuffle the encounter deck.)

Name: The Mad Doctor

Printings.Flavor: Zola's mutates attack you with blind obedience and savage fury. It's up to you to put an end to this nightmare before the mad doctor unleashes them upon the world!

Rules: When Revealed: Each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a minion and reveals it. Shuffle the encounter deck.

Name: Defensive Programming
Rules:
Attach to the minion with the most remaining hit points without another copy of Defensive Programming attached. If you cannot, this card gains surge.
Attached minion gets +2 hit points and gains guard.

Name: New World Hydra

Printings.Flavor: The Red Skull is one step closer to unlocking the full power of the Infinity Stone. You need to stop him before he does, and all reality is bent to his evil will.

Rules: When Revealed: Reveal the top card of the side-scheme deck and put it into play.

Name: New World Hydra
Rules:
{s} Forced Response: After resolving step one of the villain phase, reveal the top card of the side-scheme deck and put it into play.
If this scheme is completed, the players lose the game.

Name: Infinite Power
Rules:
When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Give Red Skull a tough status card. Red Skull schemes.
When Revealed (Hero): Give Red Skull a tough status card. Red Skull attacks you.

Name: Combat Knife
Rules:
Attach to the villain.
{s} Attached villain's attacks gain piercing.
Hero Action: Spend {m}{p} resources → discard this card.

Name: Hydra Sidearm
Rules:
Attach to the villain.
{s} Forced Interrupt: When attached villain attacks, the attack gains ranged.
Hero Action: Spend {m}{p} resources → discard this card.

Name: Concussion Grenade
Rules:
When Revealed (Alter-Ego): You are confused. Place 1 threat on the main scheme (2 threat instead if you were already confused).
When Revealed (Hero): You are stunned. Deal 1 damage to your hero (2 damage instead if you were already stunned).

Name: Wrecker
Rules:
{s} When Wrecker schemes, place the threat on his side scheme instead of the main scheme.
{s} While Wrecker is attacking, he gets +2 ATK if the attack is undefended.

Name: Held Hostage
Rules:
Attach to the active villain's side scheme.
Threat cannot be removed from attached scheme by thwarting.
Hero Action: The villain corresponding to the attached side scheme attacks you. Then, discard this card.

Name: Magic Crowbar
Rules:
Attach to Wrecker.
{s} Forced Response: After Wrecker attacks, place 1 threat on the side scheme with the least threat.
Hero Action: Exhaust your hero and discard 1 card at random from your hand → discard this card.

Name: Chaos in the Prison
Rules: When Revealed: Choose to either discard an upgrade you control or place 1 threat on the active villain's side scheme for each upgrade you control. If you do not control any upgrades, this card gains surge.
Special: {s} Boost: If this attack is undefended, discard an upgrade you control.

Name: Crowbar Toss
Rules:
When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Wrecker schemes. Then, move the active villain counter to the villain whose side scheme has the least threat.
When Revealed (Hero): Wrecker attacks you. Then, move the active villain counter to the villain whose side scheme has the least threat.

Name: Thunderball
Rules:
{s} When Thunderball schemes, place the threat on his side scheme instead of the main scheme.
{s} Forced Response: After Thunderball attacks you, deal 1 damage to each character you control.

Name: Thunderball
Rules:
{s} When Thunderball schemes, place the threat on his side scheme instead of the main scheme.
{s} Forced Response: After Thunderball attacks you, deal 1 damage to each character you control.

Name: Thunderstruck
Rules:
Thunderball's Side Scheme.
This card cannot leave play while Thunderball is in play.
Gamma Blast — Forced Response: After threat is placed here, if there is 10 or more threat here, stun each friendly character. Remove all but 3 threat from this scheme.

Name: Ball and Chain
Rules:
Attach to Thunderball.
{s} Forced Response: After Thunderball attacks, place 1 threat on the main scheme.
Hero Action: Exhaust your hero and discard 1 card at random from your hand → discard this card.

Name: Piledriver
Rules:
Retaliate 1.
{s} When Piledriver schemes, place the threat on his side scheme instead of the main scheme.

Name: Piledriver
Rules:
Retaliate 1.
{s} When Piledriver schemes, place the threat on his side scheme instead of the main scheme.

Name: Pile It On!
Rules:
Piledriver's Side Scheme.
This card cannot leave play while Piledriver is in play.
Pile Drive — Forced Response: After threat has been placed here, if there is 10 or more threat here, each player discards the upgrade or support they control with the highest cost. Remove all but 3 threat from this scheme.

Name: Pummel
Rules:
When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Piledriver schemes. If Piledriver is tough, he gets +2 SCH for this activation.
When Revealed (Hero): Piledriver attacks you. If Piledriver is tough, he gets +2 ATK for this activation.

Name: Bulldozer
Rules:
{s} When Bulldozer schemes, place the threat on his side scheme instead of the main scheme.
{s} Forced Interrupt: When Bulldozer attacks, the attack gains overkill.

Name: Bulldozer
Rules:
{s} When Bulldozer schemes, place the threat on his side scheme instead of the main scheme.
{s} Forced Interrupt: When Bulldozer attacks, the attack gains overkill.

Name: Clear the Road
Rules:
Bulldozer's Side Scheme.
This card cannot leave play while Bulldozer is in play.
Charge! — Forced Response: After threat is placed here, if there is 10 or more threat here, each player must discard the top 10 cards of their deck. Remove all but 3 threat from this scheme.

Name: Bulldozer's Helmet
Rules:
Attach to Bulldozer.
{s} Forced Response: After Bulldozer attacks you, discard 1 card from the top of your deck for each point of damage dealt by this attack.
Hero Action: Exhaust your hero and discard 1 card at random from your hand → discard this card.

Name: Bull Rush
Rules:
When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Bulldozer schemes. Discard the top card of your deck for each threat placed by this activation.
When Revealed (Hero): Bulldozer attacks you. Discard the top card of your deck for each damage dealt by this attack.

Name: The Infinity Stones

Printings.Flavor: Thanos has gathered all six Infinity Stones into the Infinity Gauntlet. He has only to master its power in order to enact his genocidal plan.

Rules: When Revealed: Put the top card of the Infinity Stone deck into play. Search the encounter deck for the Sanctuary side scheme and reveal it. (Shuffle the encounter deck.)

Name: Balance the Scales

Printings.Flavor: With a snap of his fingers, Thanos wiped out half of all life in the universe. If you can wrest the Gauntlet from the Mad Titan, perhaps you can use its power to undo this tragedy. But if you fail, there will be no one left to stand against him.

Rules: If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

Name: Kang's Arrival

Printings.Flavor: Kang believes that by defeating Earth's mightiest heroes, the rest of the planet will submit to his rule.

Rules:
When Revealed: Deal each player an encounter card.
If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

Name: The Chronopolis
Rules:
Forced Response: After this stage is completed, place 1 set-aside Kang's Dominion facedown under stage 4A. At the end of the phase, remove Kang (Immortus) and this stage from the game and combine your game area with another game area.
If all the players at this stage are defeated, this stage is completed.

Name: The Realm of Rama-Tut
Rules:
Forced Response: After this stage is completed, place 1 set-aside Kang's Dominion facedown under stage 4A. At the end of the phase, remove Kang (Rama-Tut) and this stage from the game and combine your game area with another game area.
If all the players at this stage are defeated, this stage is completed.

Name: Kang's Wrath
Rules:
When Revealed: Each player searches the encounter deck discard pile, and set-aside area for their nemesis minion and puts it into play engaged with them. Shuffle the encounter deck.
If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

Name: Breakout
Rules:
{s} Forced Response: After step one of the villain phase, place 1 threat on each side scheme. Move the active counter to the villain whose scheme has the most threat. (If there is a tie, the first player chooses.)
If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

Name: The Master of Time
Rules:
Forced Interrupt: When an acceleration token would be placed on another scheme, place it here instead.
Players cannot join this game area unless there are no other game areas remaining. When all the players have joined this game area, advance to stage 4A.

Name: Corrupt Prison Guard
Rules: Guard.

Name: Collector

Printings.Flavor: "You're more wily than I gave you credit for. No matter. Let's try again."

Rules:
Collector cannot be defeated.
Forced Interrupt: When the round ends, flip this card, then set Collector's hit point dial to his printed hit points.

Name: "I Am Inevitable"
Rules: When Revealed: Give Thanos 1 facedown boost card.

Rules:
While Lucia von Bardas is in play, this card gains a hazard icon ({h}).
While Lucia von Bardas is not in play, this card gains an acceleration icon ({a}).

Name: Haywire
Rules:
Attach to your identity.
Treat the printed resource of each card in your hand as if it were {e}.
Hero Action: Choose to either discard a card you control with a printed {e} resource or take 2 indirect damage → discard this card.

Name: Nightcrawler
Rules: Interrupt: When an X-Men character would take any amount of damage from an enemy attack, spend a {e} resource and return Nightcrawler to your hand → prevent all of that damage.

Name: Save the School
Rules: Forced Response: After the villain is defeated, if there are X villains in the victory display, the players win the game. (See {x} rulebook, page 15.) Otherwise, deal each player an encounter card and reveal the next villain. If a minion with the same title as the new villain is engaged with a player, discard that minion and the villain activates against that player.
